column3: River's strong,, you can't swim inside it
column4: We could string some lights up the hill beside it
column5: Tonight the moon's so bright you could drive with your headlights out
column6: Because a little bit of summer's what the whole year's all about
column10: Put your feet up next to mine
column11: We can watch that water line get higher and higher
column13: Hasn't it been some kind of day?
column14: You and me been catching on like a wildfire
column21: We can dance with the dead
column22: You can rest your head on my shoulder
column23: If you want to get older with me
column24: Because a little bit of summer makes a lot of history
column29: I got a rock from the river
